first_para: Alan Reid (born 7 August 1954, Ayr) is a Scottish politician. He is Liberal Democrat Member of Parliament for Argyll and Bute, and was first elected at the 2001 general election.

full.extract: Alan Reid (born 7 August 1954, Ayr) is a Scottish politician. He is Liberal Democrat Member of Parliament for Argyll and Bute, and was first elected at the 2001 general election.
full.title: Alan Reid (politician)
